title: Major patch issues on Mac
body:
I've had to uninstall and reinstall League 3 times today due to the faulty/broken patch which simply gets up to 80% and then doesnt move at all. You need to fix this cause its getting really, really annoying that I couldnt enjoy my weekend on League like I planned to with a friend :/. Thanks Riot

Basically all that happens is that I try to patch and it does nothing
